entry.tran: 史前历史；史前时期；远古时期
entry.def: Prehistory is the time in history before any information was written down.

means.word_mean: 1. the time during the development of human culture before the appearance of the written word

pre在……前的,预先+caution小心→预先小心→预防

pre在……前的,预先+cept拿→以前拿好的[名言]→格言
pre在……前的,预先+cinct捆→预先捆好的→范围
pre在……前的,预先+cipice头→在前面是尽头→峭壁
pre在……前的,预先+cipit头→ation→落在前头→降落,下降
